page.title: 10Henstridge Village School
page.content: {Henstridge Village School} is a voluntary aided school which has around 60 pupils,but the numbers on the roll are falling.This is a trend in many of the local village schools. As a result a {Small Schools {Association}has been formed,it is made up of four small schools and the aim is to widen the social experience of the pupils. There has been a reaction against the closure of small schools such as{ {Henstridge School}as many villagers see such closures as the start of the decline of a village.
